secret_rule: Only items that are typically found in a children's toy box can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "teddy bear" and "building blocks".
I would like to make a guess about an item that fits the rule. Can I bring a "dollhouse"?
Yes, you can bring a dollhouse.
I would like to make a guess about an item that fits the rule. Can I bring a "puzzle"?
Yes, you can bring a puzzle.
I would like to make a guess about an item that fits the rule. Can I bring "toy cars"?
Yes, you can bring toy cars.
I would like to make a guess about an item that fits the rule. Can I bring "action figures"?
Yes, you can bring action figures.
Based on the examples given and the items that have been accepted, my guess about the rule is: The items must be types of toys or playthings that are commonly used by children.
Correct! The rule is Only items that are typically found in a children's toy box can be brought to the picnic.
